name: MiniJam 46 - Justice
description:
My submission for MiniJam 46 - Justice.

The limitation of this jam was "5 Colors", which mean't I could only use 5 colors (and no shades of colors).

I was hoping to tell a compelling story in this project, but I got distracted making the UI! Better luck next time.

I hope you enjoy!

Known Bugs

You can call the opponent (defenders) witnesses to the stand and the enemy AI will be like "Huh? Who am I supposed to call to the stand?" and then soft-lock.

The text on the WebGL build looks a bit funky. It seems WebGL does this quite a lot.
